1.0.name: wordpress/appleicons
1.0.description:
Simply add the Icons and loading screens for various versions of iPhone and iPad.

Features:- 1. Easy to manage. 2. It offers and demonstrated the user experience for icons with and without the Apple icon glossy effect. 3. Supports to all apple devices. 4. You can set small(57x57) and large(114x114) icons for various devices. 5. You can set loading screens also for all apple devices. For further help contact us at http://devx.in http://sunilkumardhanda.me
